About Me

Let me tell you a little about myself and what I do...

Website & App Developer

A web developer who is experienced in building quality websites for businesses. I develop and deploy Websites and Web Applications. Efficient in creating responsive websites, with good user experience and interface. I am competent in HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, React, Node, MongoDB, Postman http Request, RESTful API's, Bootstrap, Materialize CSS, SCSS, JQuery, Redux, Figma. Both front-end and Back-end are my specialization. I’ll fully project manage your brief from start to finish.


WORK EXPERIENCE:

HTML5, CSS3, JAVASCRIPT ES2015. Work with JavaScript frameworks such as REACT & NODE.js basically. And styling frameworks like BOOTSTRAP, MATERIALIZE, SKELETON, BOOTSWATCH. I worked with Mongoose MongoDB, Postman http request, RESTful API's. I use FIGMA -design tool. I Fetch API's and implement them successfully in development. 4 years experience with consistent advancement in Software Development. Understand Back-end and Front-end technology, with deployment processes. Possess good debugging skills. Work individually and collaboratively. Version control: GIT
